Package DAO

Class AppointmentDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
DAO.AppointmentDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAOImpl extends Object implements AppointmentDAO
This is the Appointment Data Access Object concrete class which implements the AppointmentDAO interface. This class is responsible for accessing data from the database.

    • addAppt

      public void addAppt(String apptTitle, String description, String location, String apptType, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, LocalDateTime createDate, String createdBy, LocalDateTime lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID) throws SQLException
      Adds an appointment to the database
      Specified by:
      addAppt in interface AppointmentDAO
      Parameters:
      apptTitle - The appt title to add.
      description - The appt description to add.
      location - The appt location to add.
      apptType - The appt type to add.
      startDateTime - The appt start date/time to add.
      endDateTime - The appt end date/time to add.
      createDate - The appt create date.
      createdBy - The user who created the appt.
      lastUpdate - The user who last updated the appt.
      lastUpdatedBy - The user who last updated the appt.
      customerID - The customer ID the appointment is with.
      userID - The user ID associated with the appt.
      contactID - The contact ID associated with the appt.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if there is a MySQL database access error.

    • modifyAppt

      public void modifyAppt(int apptID, String apptTitle, String description, String location, String apptType, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, LocalDateTime createDate, String createdBy, LocalDateTime lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int customerID, int userID, int contactID) throws SQLException
      Modifies a selected appointment's data and changes the values in the database when saved.
      Specified by:
      modifyAppt in interface AppointmentDAO
      Parameters:
      apptID - The appt ID - cannot be modified, auto-generated. Text field disabled.
      apptTitle - The appt title to modify.
      description - The appt description to modify.
      location - The appt location to modify.
      apptType - The appt type to modify.
      start - The start time of the appt to modify.
      end - The end time of the appointment to modify.
      customerID - The customer ID to modify.
      userID - The user ID to modify.
      contactID - The ID of the contact to modify.
      Throws:
      SQLException - Thrown if there is a MySQL database access error.

      Parameters:
